Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: local history material, children's play equipment, A3 and A4 photocopier, talking books, Urdu books and magazines. Polish books. Library available for meetings and exhibitions. Activities include Baby Time and Story Time, Walkley Forum (see separate entry), Area Panel Meetings and Councillor's surgeries. Provides 4 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office and internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Tues and Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Mon 2-3pm (under 5s Story Time), 4th Wed in the month 10am-12noon (coffee morning), 2nd Mon in the month 7-8.30pm (Walkley Community Forum), one Fri in the month (Baby Time, please ring for details), 4th Sat in the month (Councillor's surgery)
